snippet: The Horcón Tract was a chunk of territory that Americans forgot. Let’s make sure we don’t do that again in the name of border security.
abstract: Op-Ed article by former American diplomat Stephen R Kelly recounts history of the Horcon Tract, chunk of American territory that was forgotten about and eventually given to Mexico in 1970; warns similar fate may befall the area that lies beyond the border fence being set up along the Mexican-American border.
lead_paragraph: The Horcón Tract was a chunk of territory that Americans forgot. Let’s make sure we don’t do that again in the name of border security.
